Combine this Ryzen 9 7900X with a 1000W PSU, an X670 mobo, and a 2TB SSD 
for $264 in savings
text: PC Guide is reader-supported. When you buy through links on our site, we may earn an affiliate commission. Prices subject to change. Read More Last Updated on March 28, 2024 If you want to save as much as possible on your first PC build, we’ve come up with the perfect bundle for you. This Ryzen 9 7900X combo, which includes a 1000W PSU, a Gigabyte X670 motherboard, and a Western Digital 2TB SSD, gets you a tremendous $264 in savings when you buy these parts altogether! This package deal is only available via Newegg, where the AMD CPU already has a whopping 28% discount. This brings the 7900X’s price down from $548.99 to $390.99, saving you $158 on a top-of-the-line processor. But the price cuts don’t stop there. You can get an additional $106 off by bundling it up with the components we mentioned above. Of course, there are other parts you can add to the combo, like 32GB RAM and a liquid CPU cooler, that’ll also come with their own discounts. If you want more processor options, check out the best CPU for gaming in 2024 as well. AMD Ryzen 9 7900X + ASUS ROG Strix 1000W PSU, Gigabyte X670 Motherboard, and Western Digital 2TB SSD Best Deals Getting four top-class parts at this price point makes this combo a must-have for anyone looking to build or upgrade their PC. But don’t take our word for it; check out some of its key specs below instead: Head over to the CPU’s Newegg product page to get this combo for yourself. Again, you’ll have to buy all parts simultaneously to avail of the $264 discount. If you don’t want to spend too much, however, you can get the 7900X by itself since it already comes with a generous $158 price drop.  Nico is a Tech News Writer for PC Guide.
